branchCategory.name: 90-MHZL2, Air Gripper, Parallel Type, Long Stroke
branchCategory.description: <p>Air Gripper series 90-MHZL2 series is a&nbsp;wide opening parallel air gripper. A linear guide provides high&nbsp; rigidity and high accuracy. 90-MHZL2 is made from materials compatible with secondary battery manufacturing. High degree of mounting precision is achieved and mounting repeatability is improved.</p>

breadCrumb.name: 90-MHZL2, Air Gripper, Parallel Type, Long Stroke
